answers.text:
Both the HUD and US Treasury CDFI Fund websites may be good sources for you to check out to point you in directions for good examples.  HUD CDBG entitlement communities can structure use of their funds, especially through non-profit community housing development organizations (CHoDOs), to accomplish similar programs to what you describe (but workforce must fit eligibility income definitions), and Community Development Financial Institutions at the local level do partner with local governments to promote programs similar to what you describe.

author: Rhoda Stauffer
text: I'm looking for governments who have experience in facilitating the development of lending pools for gap financing (soft second) to qualified households in order to sell high priced properties to workforce community members.  I'm looking for some examples and lessons learned.
title: Mortgage Finance Assistance to Address Affordable Housing Needs
